tool_description: Website Screenshot API lets you get the screenshots of any site pages of your choice as a file in jpg, png, or PDF file (with embedded links) in just one API call.
name: Website Screenshot
title: Website Screenshot

api_list.name: Website Screenshot (v1)
api_list.description: Get a screenshot of any web page with one API call (v1)

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Image output type. Acceptable values: jpg | png pdf. Default: jpg

optional_parameters.name: imageOutputFormat
optional_parameters.description: Response output format. Acceptable values: image | base64. Default: image

optional_parameters.name: quality
optional_parameters.description: Image quality. (only for jpg type). Acceptable values: 40 < quality < 99. Default: jpg

optional_parameters.name: delay
optional_parameters.description: Custom delay (ms) before screen capture. Acceptable values: 0 < delay < 10000 ms. Default: 250

optional_parameters.name: thumbWidth
optional_parameters.description: Image thumb width (px). Acceptable values: 50 < thumbWidth < width param value. Default: 0

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description: fast - waiting for the document.load event. slow - waiting for network idle event. Default: fast

optional_parameters.name: timeout
optional_parameters.description: Custom timeout (ms) for page loading. Acceptable values: 1000 < timeout < 30000 ms. Default: 15000

optional_parameters.name: height
optional_parameters.description: Image height (px). Acceptable values: 100 < width < 3000. Default: 600

optional_parameters.name: scale
optional_parameters.description: deviceScaleFactor value for the emulator. Acceptable values: 0.5 < scale < 4.0. Default: 1.0

optional_parameters.name: scroll
optional_parameters.description: If specified, scrolls down and up (useful for fullpage screenshots).

optional_parameters.name: landscape
optional_parameters.description: If specified, renders page in landscape mode (useful for smartphone emulation).

optional_parameters.name: width
optional_parameters.description: Image width (px). Acceptable values: 100 < width < 3000. Default: 800

optional_parameters.name: errorsOutputFormat
optional_parameters.description: Errors output format. Acceptable values: JSON | XML. Default: JSON

optional_parameters.name: touchScreen
optional_parameters.description: If specified, emulates device with a touch screens.
